short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: For cssobj in chrome extension, Add a sidebar that displays the stylesheet text associated with the selected style element.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: For developer, when used with css-in-js technology, <style> tag may generated from JS, thus cannot be viewed inside. This extension help to show the generated style text using JS.
